processes.Name: get property
processes.Description: get property of type String, bool or number. To get value from fired control left view_name and control_name empty.

processes.Name: set property
processes.Description: Dynamic set control property from JObject. To get value from fired control left view_name and control_name empty.

processes.Name: get var from control
processes.Description: get var from control. To get value from fired control left view_name and control_name empty.

processes.Name: set var in control
processes.Description: get var in control. To get value from fired control left view_name and control_name empty.
